messages.message:
Brian
I miss you guys.  I need your help.  I stopped going to Impact church because the pastor said I wasn't allowed to use the word Karma.  I think this is intolerant.  I believe Genesis and Revelation are something that happens to every person over time, not a specific event in world history.

Brian
Can you do me a favor?
Hi Brian, sorry to hear  What favor could we do for you?

Brian
Send someone you like a compliment
Wouldn't know what to say...  more like everyone has a freedom to think and believe what they want! Find a place where you can express your thoughts freely

Brian
Hmm. I think that is getting smaller. Only friends really.

If you really like that church then tell the pastor that you respect his different believe and you don't have to talk about the topics you have different opinion on, just concentrate on similarities  Many people in different churches have wide believes on certain topics, and that doesn't need to divide them

Brian
I am thankful for you!!
Thankful for you guys as well  ðŸ¤—
